name: Filter AAAA App
description: Filters AAAA (IPv6) records from DNS responses.

fields.name: enableFilterAaaa
fields.label: Enable AAAA Filtering
fields.help: Enable or disable AAAA (IPv6) record filtering

fields.name: defaultTtl
fields.label: Default TTL
fields.help: TTL value for filtered responses (in seconds)

fields.name: bypassLocalZones
fields.label: Bypass Local Zones
fields.help: Don't filter AAAA records for local zones

fields.name: bypassNetworks
fields.label: Bypass Networks
fields.help: Network addresses/subnets to bypass filtering (CIDR notation)

fields.name: filterDomains
fields.label: Filter Domains
fields.help: Specific domains to filter AAAA records for (if empty, filters all)
